name: Playmobil Interactive: Top Agents
overview: 60 unique missions A whole explorable town & GTA-like quest and destination system Approximately 8 main locations and 16 Platform levels Various puzzles accompany the main story 7 funny minigames: Lock picking, Computer hacking, Spying, Diving, Jet Ski, gliders, rocket duels Locations and levels are unlocked as you progress
